pyramids.process package¶

Submodules¶

pyramids.process.struct module¶

Spyder Editor

This is a temporary script file.

pyramids.process.struct.calculateDisplacement(atoms, atomsOrigin, selectedAtoms=None)[source]¶

return the displacements as a dimension of Natoms

pyramids.process.struct.calculateRDF(step, b=98, lb=0.1, hb=5.0)[source]¶

return the radius distribution function of a certain step calculate the histogram, devide bins segments between lowbound and highbound

pyramids.process.struct.calculateRMSD(selectedStep=None, atomsOrigin=None, init=0, selectedAtoms=None)[source]¶

return the radius mean square displacements of the selected steps compared with the init step
